```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```

```{r}
rwa_data <- read_csv("rwa.csv")

glimpse(rwa_data)

dim(rwa_data)
```
# Clean the column headers
```{r}
rwa_data_clean_names <- rwa_data %>% 
  clean_names()
```

# Add an "id" column
```{r}
rwa_data_with_id <- rwa_data_clean_names %>% 
  rownames_to_column("id")
```
